mapper.select: SELECT LogID, Priority, ErrorTime, ErrorCode, ErrorType, ErrorOption, ErrorMessage, ErrorDetail, `Status`, (CASE Status WHEN 'I' THEN 'Init' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Processing' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Close' END) AS StatusText, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM SystemLog ORDER BY InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT LogID, Priority, ErrorTime, ErrorCode, ErrorType, ErrorOption, ErrorMessage, ErrorDetail, `Status`, (CASE Status WHEN 'I' THEN 'Init' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Processing' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Close' END) AS StatusText, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM SystemLog WHERE LogID = #{logID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
